basics.name: suzulang
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer specializing in Rails backend and Next.js frontend. Passionate about efficient web apps and Ruby philosophy. Eager to grow and contribute in a professional setting.

work.name: MJ
responsibilities: Organize and develop Azure Data Factory pipelines and dataflows according to project requirements
Conduct thorough testing of Azure solutions to ensure reliability and performance
Create comprehensive documentation for Azure development processes and best practices
Collaborate with team members to implement and optimize Azure-based solutions
achievements: Rapidly acquired proficiency in Azure technologies, demonstrating strong learning capabilities
Developed a comprehensive internal documentation for Azure development, facilitating easier onboarding and knowledge sharing for future team members
Contributed to the successful implementation of several Azure Data Factory projects, improving data processing efficiency

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

education.institution: ECC Japanese Language Institute Nagoya School

certificates.name: JLPT N1
certificates.issuer: The Japan Foundation and Japan Educational Exchanges and Services

projects.name: Menu Website
projects.description: A personal menu website featuring my favorite dishes and culinary skills, built with Astro and Tailwind CSS.
highlights: Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive design
Features categorized dishes with detailed recipes and interactive elements

projects.name: Qwerty Learner
projects.description: An open-source typing practice tool designed for keyboard workers to enhance word memory and English muscle memory.
highlights: Contributed to the Japanese dictionary component of the project
Collaborated with a team of developers to improve language learning features
Gained experience in open-source contribution and version control using Git
